Articles.Content:
I've finally gotten an install of RSS/RO to finally work for me and as I've been building rockets, I've been wondering if it's possible for there to be an external Search function where I could input my search variables (a range to request how much thrust I'm after, number of ignitions, gimballing, etc etc). Since I often have to scan all of the varying choices of engines to find one that has enough thrust (not too much, but not too little), but also multiple ignitions (if needed).

Just my thoughts though, but maybe I'm mad since I haven't heard anyone else mention this.
